resources.string: Category wise status based on Interests !
Quotes written on Images with Beautiful Backgrounds !
Square sized Images to share directly on your Social Networks !
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

Insta Bios Quotes is an app developed by Kshitij Singh in 2016. He has taken in the consideration the reviews and feedbacks recieved from app users to improve the user experience. However now the app has moved under BEINGDEV devs. We are still open for suggestion and feedbacks. Help us sending in your views. 

 Every week we add new quotes, sayings and Proverbs. Our team constantly watches for new status and quotes updates over internet, books, Poems, Speeches, Social Media, Movies, TV etc. 

 If you feel like sharing some quotes or your own writings, send in them via feedback or contact forms !

Most of the content of app is contributed by our app users or developers. However, some of the content may have been picked up from the Internet. If you see anything in the app or website for which you hold copyright, please inform us immediately. We will look formward and remove it if found voilating norms or give you credits.

 Website : www.beingdev.com 

 E-Mail: beingdev.com@gmail.com
